data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruiz, Gustavo R. S., Maddison, Wayne P. (2015): The new Andean jumping spider genus Urupuyu and its placement within a revised classification of the Amycoida (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 4040 (3): 251-279, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.3.1
